import React from'react';import{attachUniversalProps}from'./helpers/universal-props';/**
 * <Radio />
 * 
 * ```jsx
 * <Radio
 *   name="my_radio"
 *   id="my_radio"
 *   checked={true}
 * >
 *   Option value
 * </Radio>
 * ```
 */function Radio(props){var classNames=['alegrify-radio'];if(props.className){classNames.push(props.className);}if(props.disabled){classNames.push('alegrify-radio--disabled');}return React.createElement("div",{className:classNames.join(' ')},React.createElement("input",{type:"radio",id:props.id,name:props.name,className:"alegrify-radio__trigger",disabled:props.disabled,checked:props.checked,onChange:props.onChange}),React.createElement("label",{htmlFor:props.id,className:"alegrify-radio__check"},React.createElement("span",{className:"alegrify-radio__label"},props.children)));}Radio.defaultProps={disabled:false,checked:false,className:''};export default attachUniversalProps(Radio);Radio.__docgenInfo={"description":"<Radio />\n\n```jsx\n<Radio\n  name=\"my_radio\"\n  id=\"my_radio\"\n  checked={true}\n>\n  Option value\n</Radio>\n```","methods":[],"displayName":"Radio","props":{"disabled":{"defaultValue":{"value":"false","computed":false},"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Is radio disabled?"},"checked":{"defaultValue":{"value":"false","computed":false},"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Is radio checked?"},"className":{"defaultValue":{"value":"''","computed":false},"type":{"name":"string"},"required":false,"description":"Additional classnames"},"id":{"type":{"name":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Input id"},"name":{"type":{"name":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Input value"},"children":{"type":{"name":"union","value":[{"name":"arrayOf","value":{"name":"node"}},{"name":"node"}]},"required":true,"description":"Radio label content"}}};
